classFeatures.name: Wildtouch
classFeatures.description: You can perform harmless, subtle effects that involve nature at will. (Ex: causing a flower to rapidly grow, summon a slight gust of wind, start a campfire, etc)

classFeatures.name: Beastform
classFeatures.description:
Mark a Stress to transform into a magical creature of your level or lower from the Beastform list. While transformed, you can't use your equipment or cast any spells, but you gain the features, attack trait, and armor score of the creature. You can drop out of this form at any time. When you do, your used armor slots remain marked.

If you mark your last Hit Point or Stress Point, this form automatically drops.
